title: Blueberry Cheesecake French Toast
directions: Spray a 9x13 baking dish with nonstick cooking spray (really get it in the corners)
Layer half the cubed bread in dish
with a hand mixer cream sugar and cream cheese and vanilla
toss the frozen blueberries in flour
whisk the eggs and milk till combined
press bread with spatula to help soak up mixture
the next morning preheat oven to 350
ingredients: 1 loaf day old french bread cubed
1 1/2 cups frozen blueberries, tossed lightly with flour (leave frozen)
